headline: Why Micron Stock Sank Today
summary: Micron Technology (NASDAQ: MU) stock ended Monday's trading in the red.  The S&P 500 index fell 2.4%, and the Nasdaq Composite ended the day down 2.6%.  Micron's valuation moved lower today as investors reacted negatively to President Trump's latest comments targeting the Federal Reserve and its Chair Jerome Powell.
